base.name: TransferFunction
base.description: Models a linear system by a transfer function of the Laplace-domain variable s.
base.development_notes: the order of the denominator must be greater than the numerator. leading zeros in either num or den should be pruned.

parameter_definitions.name: numerator_coefficients
parameter_definitions.description: Coefficients of the polynomial of Laplace variable s for the numerator of the transfer function.

parameter_definitions.name: denominator_coefficients
parameter_definitions.description: Coefficients of the polynomial of Laplace variable s for the denominator of the transfer function.
